price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߏ߫ ߘߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߓߐ߱ ߘߐ߫
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
